Description:
As a pet owner I want to register with email/password so that I can access my space
AC: form validation, bcrypt, confirmation mail

As a pet owner I want to log in so that I manage my animals
AC: JWT issued, redirect dashboard

As a pet owner I want to search by postcode so that I find nearest clinic
AC: JSON list <1s

As a pet owner I want to pick date and slot so that I plan my visit
AC: calendar loads available slots
